content: मंडः --डं [मन्-ड तस्य नेत्वं, मंड्-अच् वा] {@--1@} The thick oily matter or scum forming on the surface of any liquid. {@--2@} The scum of boiled rice; नीवारौदनमंडमुष्णमधुरं <ls>U. 4. 1.</ls> {@--3@} Cream (of milk). {@--4@} Foam, froth or scum in general. {@--5@} Ferment. {@--6@} Gruel. {@--7@} Pith, essence. {@--8@} The head. {@--9@} The spirituous part of wine. --डः {@--1@} An ornament, decoration. {@--2@} A frog. {@--3@} The castor-oil tree. --डा {@--1@} Spirituous liquor. {@--2@} The emblic myrobalan tree.

मंडः --डं [मन्-ड तस्य नेत्वं, मंड्-अच् वा] {@--1@} The thick oily matter or scum forming on the surface of any liquid. {@--2@} The scum of boiled rice; नीवारौदनमंडमुष्णमधुरं <ls>U. 4. 1.</ls> {@--3@} Cream (of milk). {@--4@} Foam, froth or scum in general. {@--5@} Ferment. {@--6@} Gruel. {@--7@} Pith, essence. {@--8@} The head. {@--9@} The spirituous part of wine. --डः {@--1@} An ornament, decoration. {@--2@} A frog. {@--3@} The castor-oil tree. --डा {@--1@} Spirituous liquor. {@--2@} The emblic myrobalan tree.
